T206 lot of 13, includes Dummy Taylor, Wiltse, Anderson, Pastorius, Sweeney, Jordan portrait, Congalton (trimmed), Camnitz, Casey, Parent, Bell, Cree and Manning.  All VG or better, $265 delivered.

T206 Thomas, American Beauty.  A beautiful card, strong EX, however it was removed from a PSA Authentic holder.  Looks to have very slight trimming in the upper right corner.  SOLD

T202 Bush Just Misses Austin, with Moran and Magee on the side panels.  VG condition, spider crease on Magee's face.  $40 delivered.
